mixed-citation.article-title: First records and two new species of sipunculans (Sipuncula) from the Southern Mexican Pacific

tp:treatment-sec.p: as Aspidosiphon coyi ; type locality: Indian Ocean. — Keferstein 1867: 50–53, pl. 6, figs 15–18, as Phascolosoma truncatum (probably Panama and Galapagos Islands, without specification by the author). Questionable record in the TEP.
